text: Today, in the Maule Region, we inaugurated the works for the improvement and expansion of the Tax Stadium in Talca with 8,200 seats.
Then come other stadiums for Puerto Montt, Antofagasta, Calama, La Serena, Viña, Valparaíso, Rancagua, Concepcion, Curicó and Iquique.

Automatic registration and voluntary voting is a historic reform that revitalizes and rejuvenates our democracy.
Almost 5 million Chileans, who did not participate in our democracy, will now have not only the right to voice but also vote.
I call all young people to join and participate in our democracy, which needs their ideas, strength, joy and enthusiasm.
@Kiluvia04 Ahsante sana.
This reform is added to that of the secret suffrage of 1874 and to which he granted the right to vote to women in 1949.
With automatic registration and voluntary voting we take another step to deepen democracy, fulfilling our campaign commitment
